quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Boss and Tony Micelli
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, abc, samantha. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who played Mona Robinson on the ABC show Whos The Boss??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katherine Helmond

questions.question: Where did Angela Bower and Tony Micelli live on the show Whos the Boss?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Connecticut

questions.question: Family Feud has been hosted by several different hosts. Which of the listed people was one of them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Dawson

questions.question: Which of the following hosted Lets Make A Deal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monty Hall

questions.question: In the TV series Whos the Boss? Angela worked at what advertising agency?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wallace and McQuade

questions.question: What year did Whos The Boss? make its television debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1984

questions.question: Samantha Micelli, a character from Whos the Boss? got married in 1991. What was the name of her husband?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hank

questions.question: Which of the following hosted the Match Game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Rayburn

questions.question: What year did the popular sitcom Whos The Boss? leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1992

questions.question: This American journalist started hosting the American version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire in 2002.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meredith Vieira

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: St. Louis Cardinals

questions.question: Who hosted The Newlywed Game from 1966 - 1974?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bob Eubanks

questions.question: Tony Micelli, one of the main characters on the show Whos the Boss? took a job as a housekeeper for Angela. What was Angelas last name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bower

questions.question: This character, played by Alyssa Milano, was Tonys daughter on the hit television show Whos The Boss?.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Samantha

questions.question: Who played Jonathan Bower on the television show Whos The Boss??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Danny Pintauro
